mapper.insert: insert into phone (PHONE_CODE, PHONE_NAME, PHONE_MAKER, PHONE_OS, PHONE_VERSION, PHONE_MAC_ADDRESS, PHONE_PASSWORD, PHONE_MEMORY, PHONE_DISPLAY) values ('PH' || lpad(PHONE_SEQ.nextval, 4, 0), #{modelName}, #{maker}, #{os}, #{version}, #{macAddress}, #{password}, #{memory}, #{display})
